name: Stickybear Spellgrabber
overview: Helping kids to spell and build vocabulary skills is just the job for Stickybear! Over 4,000 words and your own word lists spell endless fun for 6 to 9-year olds! Picture Spell. When a picture appears on the billboard, a player must jump Stickybear around shelves and platforms to select the letters that spell the illustrated word! Over 200 word/picture combinations! Word Spell. Stickbear's still on the run, jumping and grabbing fallen letters and using them to recreate the word shown on the screen! Players can use their own word lists, too! Bear Dunk. Help Stickybear stay dry! In this "hangman" game, players of all ages must try to guess words letter by letter before the platform under Stickybear gives way... and splash!... it's into the water for this bear. Use your own word lists in any subject to add hours of fun! For 1 or 2 players. Points are awarded for correct spelling, and game levels can be adjusted to suit individual child. Over 4,000 words have been specially selected from Weekly Reader word lists and the Ginn Lexicon. Spelling fun for children 6 to 9
